column2: I absolutely love their side dishes. When you order a sandwich
column3: it comes with two sides (or a cup of soup)
column4: so I typically indulge in the quinoa (black quinoa
column9: and sometimes pomegranate seeds) and the cabbage slaw (cabbage
column13: I opt for the tuscan kale (small strips of kale
column16: and parmesan cheese) or the housemade chips instead.  Really though
column17: I don't think you can go wrong.
